hero.headline: Empowering Farmers with Data-Driven Insights
hero.subHeadline: Plan smarter, harvest better, and connect directly with buyers. Farmlytics brings modern analytics to your farm.

features.title: Everything You Need to Grow Your Farm
features.subtitle: Comprehensive tools designed specifically for modern farmers to maximize productivity and profitability.

cropPlanner.title: Personalized Crop Planner
cropPlanner.description: Get AI-powered recommendations based on your soil, climate, and market demand to optimize your planting decisions.

marketConnection.title: Market Connection Module
marketConnection.description: Connect directly with buyers and access real-time market prices to get the best value for your harvest.

harvestTracker.title: Harvest & Revenue Tracker
harvestTracker.description: Track your yields, expenses, and revenue in one place. Understand your farm's financial health at a glance.

visualInsights.title: Visual Insights Dashboard
visualInsights.description: Beautiful charts and graphs that make complex farm data easy to understand and act upon.

exportInsights.title: Export & Share Reports
exportInsights.description: Generate professional reports to share with partners, lenders, or for your own records.

ctaSection.headline: Ready to Transform Your Farming?
ctaSection.subHeadline: Join thousands of farmers already using Farmlytics to make smarter decisions and increase their yields.
